LanguageData.Disease_OrganDecay.label: organ decay
LanguageData.Disease_OrganDecay.diseaseLethalLetterTe: Without a cure or replacement of some kind, {PAWN_labelShort} will die.
LanguageData.Disease_OrganDecay.letterText:
{PAWN_labelShort} has developed a flesh-eating infection known as organ decay in {PAWN_possessive} {2}!

The affected organ will slowly lose function over the next {3} days, before dying completely.

If you want {PAWN_labelShort} to stay healthy, install a replacement {2}. This could be a bionic, or a natural organ taken from a donor.
